body_html: I wasn't careful about using variable([1]) vs variable(1) here (they currently do the same thing but the later will create a scalar once we enable scalars). I'll fix that wherever necessary in the PR where we enable scalars.
body_text: I wasn't careful about using variable([1]) vs variable(1) here (they currently do the same thing but the later will create a scalar once we enable scalars).  I'll fix that wherever necessary in the PR where we enable scalars.
body: I wasn't careful about using variable([1]) vs variable(1) here (they currently do the same thing but the later will create a scalar once we enable scalars).  I'll fix that wherever necessary in the PR where we enable scalars.
